movies.title: Avatar: The Way of Water
movies.synopsis: Second installment of the Avatar series

movies.title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
movies.synopsis: Queen Ramonda, Shuri, M’Baku, Okoye, and the Dora Milaje, fight to protect their nation from intervening world powers in the wake of King T’Challa’s death.

movies.title: Puss In Boots: The Last Wish
movies.synopsis: This year, everyone's favourite leche-loving, swashbuckling, fear-defying feline returns. For the first time in more than a decade, DreamWorks Animation presents a new adventure in the Shrek universe as daring outlaw Puss in Boots discovers that his passion for peril and disregard for safety have taken their toll.

movies.title: Creed III
movies.synopsis: When a childhood friend and former boxing prodigy, Damian (Jonathan Majors), resurfaces after serving a long sentence in prison, he is eager to prove that he deserves his shot in the ring.

movies.title: Knock At The Cabin
movies.synopsis: This year, everyone's favourite leche-loving, swashbuckling, fear-defying feline returns. For the first time in more than a decade, DreamWorks Animation presents a new adventure in the Shrek universe as daring outlaw Puss in Boots discovers that his passion for peril and disregard for safety have taken their toll.
